5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray the afternoon prayer when the sun was high and bright, then one would go off to al-'Awali and get there while the sun was still high. Ibn Qutaiba made no mention of" one would go off to al-'Awali

chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to pray `Asr early
